Articles.Content:
Dear KSP community,

I am new to the game, it's fun, hilarious and educational to. Have the vanilla Windows 1.0.3 version. 

Recently started the career mode after fooling around with the tutorials and figuring out basic rocket behavior in sandbox mode. Now I want to start with the community generated campaigns but how to activate those? Install like a mod or..? Used the forum search function, searched the internet probably missed it.

Anyway thanks for the input, appreciate it!

Kind regards,

Lmascha

Hi, welcome to the forums.

Which campaigns do you mean?

If you are thinking of the ones from the wiki ([here](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Campaigns)), then there is nothing other than the informtaion there.

These campaigns are designed to be self challenges, losely based on real-world space flight developement; they aren't loadable campaigns.

If those are not what you're thinking of, then I'm afraid I can't help you.

Hi Alexin,

Correct those are the campaigns I'm refering to. Now it's clear. Thanks.

Took a look on those... it looks fun, though it's just challenges of varied difficulties. Many of those are milestones that you'd probably tried to accomplis on your own too.

Anyways, I'd suggest you to give career mode a try. It's really helpful to learn while only the most basic parts and functions are available.

The contract packs offer something along the line of "campaigns".

I did one of those myself called SETI, including some rebalancing and a techtree. Link is in my signature.
